pages.text: Collars a great accessory to give your dog if you want them to look stylish, or perhaps help identify them!$(br2)To put a collar on a dog, simply interact with them with the collar in hand. To remove a collar, you'll need a pair of shears and to interact with the dog with the shears in hand.

pages.title: Crafting
pages.text: Any color of dye may be used.
In addition to being crafted in any color by adding dye, any collar may be dyed to another color with another dye!
pages.title: Dying
